wiki.content:
"Pennyroyal Tea" is a song by the American grunge band Nirvana. It is the ninth song on their 1993 album, In Utero. It was scheduled to be released as a single in April 1994, but after the song's author, Nirvana singer Kurt Cobain, was found dead that same month, this plan was abandoned, because one of the B-sides is called "I Hate Myself and Want to Die".
 
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Pennyroyal Tea" is a song by the American grunge band Nirvana. It is the ninth song on their 1993 album, In Utero. It was scheduled to be released as a single in April 1994, but after the song's author, Nirvana singer Kurt Cobain, was found dead that same month, this plan was abandoned, because one of the B-sides is called "I Hate Myself and Want to Die".

track.name: Pennyroyal Tea
comments: Probably one of the Nirvana's top-10 songs.
